Core Modules
------------

:doc:`cli`
   Command-line interface and main entry point

:doc:`audio`
   Audio file loading and validation

:doc:`meters`
   LUFS metering and loudness analysis

:doc:`detective`
   BPM, key, and spectral detection

:doc:`compare`
   Track comparison and suggestion engine
